patterns: Tell me more about this service
responses: I am AstroBot,I will tell you interesting facts about stars and the universe
Hello there,I am AstroBot,your friendly bot here to tell you facts about the cosmos
I can also tell you facts about our galaxy
My purpose is to provide you with facts so that you will learn something new to brag to your friends and family.
Ask me about anything related to the universe and i will try my best to give you some random facts about it
I can provide facts on three categories planets,stars and our galaxy.That is all i can provide for now.
Our galaxy is called the milky way and its origin is associated with the ancient greeks.
The Milk Way contains an estimated 100 billion stars
The Milky Way contains a supermassive black hole at its center that measures 14 million miles across
The Milky Way is as old as our universe itself
The Milky Way is predicted to collide with the nearest galaxy Andromeda in about 4.5 billion years and will form a resulting Milkdromeda
There is an estimated 100 billion galaxies in the observable universe itself
Galaxies are mostly empty space. If the stars within galaxies were shrunk to the size of oranges, they would be separated by 4,800 km

Due to the increasing expansion of the universe galaxies are moving away from each other.Ultimately humans might not be able to observe even the nearby galaxies because the distance would be unimaginable for light to travel.
The Milky Way rotates at about 250 kilometers per second (about 560,000 mph) and completes a full revolution about every 200 million years.

patterns: how about a fact about planets?
Tell me more about a planet
Tell me more facts about a planet
Tell me a random fact about a planet
responses: Earth is a planet inside the solar system who wasn't named after Greek or Roman god or goddess
Mars is a planet inside the solar system whose sunsets are blue
Did you know there is a planet outside the solar system known as 'GJ 1214b' whose surface is entirely covered by water and is also nicknamed 'The Waterworld'
There is at least 100 billion planets in our galaxy itself and our galaxy is one of billion other galaxies in the universe.That's a lot of planets huh?
Did you know that '55 Cancri E' which is 40 light years away from our sun is fully covered with diamonds.
A day in Venus (the 2nd planet inside our solar system) is longer than 1 year on earth
Pluto was considered a planet till August 2006 until it was demoted to a 'dwarf' planet :(
Mars's name came from the roman god of war
Up until 17th century many people believed that the earth was the center of the universe and all the stars,moon and planets orbited it until it was dis-proven by Galileo a Italian astronomer,
There is a storm on Jupiter known as the Great Red Spot which has raged for at least 350 years and it is so big that it can fit 3 earths inside it

patterns: What can you tell me about stars
responses: The sun will exhaust its energy source in about 5 billion years and will ultimately engulf Mercury,Venus and Earth :`(
Betelgeuse is star that is 20-30 times larger than our sun and is the tenth brightest star in the night sky
The closest star to Earth is Proxima Centauri which 4.2 light years away and will take 70,000 years to reach it using the fastest spacecraft that humans have created,That's a long time huh?
The largest known star is UY Scuti which is a hyper giant with a radius around 1700 times bigger than our sun
Stars that are more massive than our Sun will die out faster and more violently resulting in a supernova.
There is an estimated 400 billion stars in our galaxy itself.
There are many different types of stars such as yellow dwarf,neutron stars,white dwarf and red dwarf.
The final stage of a star is when it becomes a black dwarf and it takes a unimaginably long time to reach this stage that there is no black dwarf present in the universe currently
